claude-mem._description: CRITICAL: Persistent memory using ChromaDB vector database. This is what gives Ada Marie long-term memory across sessions.

time._description: Time awareness - current time and timezone conversions. Change timezone to your local zone.

apple-mcp._description: macOS only: Calendar, Reminders, Notes, Mail, Contacts, Maps integration.

fetch._description: Fetch web pages for research and information gathering.

memory._description: Backup knowledge graph memory (simpler than ChromaDB but less powerful).
